author: Cory Fleming
text: REPOSTED - Are there any local governments that have implemented a major cloud-based or SaaS software application in recent years using capital improvement funds? What part of the acquisition/implementation/licenses were eligible for capital funding and if so, how was the project structured in order to enable that. Are the data developed as part of these systems viewed as an asset by the local government?
title: Funding IT as a Capital Expenditure?
